Very fun game that I have been playing for almost two years now. Wow. I never had invested in any other game so much, that says something. Really like the competitive part, the mechanics and the economy system behind it. It is just very good. Could have been perfect if game developers payed more attention. Other than that can't complain. Recommend it. Go try it out and enjoy! Gl HF!
This game is soo fun and competitiv:)
